login.login: a[class='flex items-center gap-5 self-start rounded-lg bg-blue-500 px-6 py-3 text-sm font-medium text-white transition-colors hover:bg-blue-400 md:text-base'] span
login.loginButton: button[class='flex h-10 items-center rounded-lg bg-blue-500 px-4 text-sm font-medium text-white transition-colors hover:bg-blue-400 focus-visible:outline focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-blue-500 active:bg-blue-600 aria-disabled:cursor-not-allowed aria-disabled:opacity-50 mt-4 w-full']

InvoiceCalac.Home: a[class='flex h-[48px] grow items-center justify-center gap-2 rounded-md bg-gray-50 p-3 text-sm font-medium hover:bg-sky-100 hover:text-blue-600 md:flex-none md:justify-start md:p-2 md:px-3 bg-sky-100 text-blue-600']
InvoiceCalac.Collected: body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > main:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > p:nth-child(2)
InvoiceCalac.Pendingdashboard: body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > main:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > p:nth-child(2)
InvoiceCalac.TotalInvoice: body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > main:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > p:nth-child(2)

LatestInvoices.Name: div[class='flex flex-row items-center justify-between py-4'] p[class='truncate text-sm font-semibold md:text-base']
